mapper.insert: insert into offer_prod_rel (OFFER_PROD_REL_ID, PAR_OFFER_PROD_REL_ID, OFFER_ID, PROD_ID, REL_TYPE, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, PROD_EXIST_TYPE, ROLE_ID, APPLY_REGION_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, REMARK ) values (#{offerProdRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parOfferProdRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{offerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prodId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{relType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{prodExistType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{applyRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update offer_prod_rel set PAR_OFFER_PROD_REL_ID = #{parOfferProdRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OFFER_ID = #{offerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PROD_ID = #{prodId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REL_TYPE = #{relType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EFF_DATE = #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXP_DATE = #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROD_EXIST_TYPE = #{prodExistType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, APPLY_REGION_ID = #{applyRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where OFFER_PROD_REL_ID = #{offerProdRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select OFFER_PROD_REL_ID, PAR_OFFER_PROD_REL_ID, OFFER_ID, PROD_ID, REL_TYPE, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, PROD_EXIST_TYPE, ROLE_ID, APPLY_REGION_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, REMARK from offer_prod_rel where OFFER_PROD_REL_ID = #{offerProdRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select OFFER_PROD_REL_ID, PAR_OFFER_PROD_REL_ID, OFFER_ID, PROD_ID, REL_TYPE, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, PROD_EXIST_TYPE, ROLE_ID, APPLY_REGION_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, REMARK from offer_prod_rel
